Name: Random
Description: A random reward of common quality or better.

Name: MasterTribute
Description: A random reward of uncommon quality or better.

Name: DeckSlot
Description: An additional slot for creating and saving custom decks.

Name: StandardCommendation
Description: A medium amount of reputation to acknowledge your accomplishments.

Name: CardPack
Description: Contains five random cards. At least one is guaranteed to be uncommon quality or better.
